message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I know it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $950,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am proposing an offer of $750,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, however, $750,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering its potential worth to your business.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to stay within my budget. I am willing to offer $850,000 for the product.
